creator: shlomif@shlomifish.org
text: On https://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/mod/mod_mime.html "simmilar" should be "similar". Please look into fixing it. Furthermore note that the link "I want to report a problem" on https://httpd.apache.org/docs-project/#report is broken.

Thanks for the report.

Both issues have been fixed.
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr

text:
(In reply to Christophe JAILLET from comment #1)
> Thanks for the report.
>

Thanks!
